Name: Jungle Juice
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: If this is the juice of the jungle, I'm a monkey's uncle. That said, as long fruity drinks go this is not bad at all.
Nutrition: One serving of Jungle Juice contains 235 calories
